trans-unit.source: Provides methods used to render a text box control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.
The TextBoxRenderer class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a text box control with the current visual style of the operating system.
Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control.
This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style.
To draw a text box, use one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A> methods.
These methods provide a variety of options, such as applying text formatting or specifying text bounds.

If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A> will draw the text box with the current visual style.
Otherwise, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A> will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property.

This class wraps the functionality of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=fullName> that is set to one of the elements of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TextBox.TextEdit?displayProperty=fullName> class.
For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Draws a text box control in the specified state and bounds.
Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the text box.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the text box.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState"></xref> values that specifies the visual state of the text box.
The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
Draws a text box control in the specified state and bounds, and with the specified text.
Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the text box.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the text box.
The <xref:System.String> to draw in the text box.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to `textBoxText`.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState"></xref> values that specifies the visual state of the text box.
The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
Draws a text box control in the specified state and bounds, and with the specified text and text bounds.
Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the text box.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the text box.
The <xref:System.String> to draw in the text box.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to `textBoxText`.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the bounds of `textBoxText`.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState"></xref> values that specifies the visual state of the text box.
The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
Draws a text box control in the specified state and bounds, and with the specified text and text formatting.
Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the text box.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the text box.
The <xref:System.String> to draw in the text box.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to `textBoxText`.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState"></xref> values that specifies the visual state of the text box.
The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
Draws a text box control in the specified state and bounds, and with the specified text, text bounds, and text formatting.
Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the text box.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the text box.
The <xref:System.String> to draw in the text box.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to `textBoxText`.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the bounds of `textBoxText`.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState"></xref> values that specifies the visual state of the text box.
The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer"></xref> class can be used to draw a text box with visual styles.
If this property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A> method will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
